body.p: To address this issue, the Board introduced an exception to the principle in IAS 12 that applies when an entity adopts an accounting policy of remeasuring investment property at fair value. The purpose of the exception is to reflect the entity’s expectation of recovery of the investment property in a practical manner that involves little subjectivity.
